channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Trade Higher
item.description: U.S. stocks rose, building on gains made earlier this week. Meanwhile, across the Atlantic, Europe’s economy isn’t in good shape — and that boosted th...

item.title: Lowe's beats on earnings and hikes guidance, but still expects sales to fall this year
item.description: Lowe's topped quarterly earnings and revenue estimates, but even its raised sales outlook would be a decline from last year.

item.title: 'I Don't Know Where to Turn or What to Do.' His $763,094 Retirement Fund Is in Limbo.
item.description: Richard Whitacre transferred his entire 401(k) into an account offering a ‘guaranteed’ 15.25% return. Will he ever see his money again?

item.title: Swiss Private Bank EFG Aims to Win More Wealthy Clients
item.description: The bank, which competes with UBS Group, is on the hunt for acquisitions, EFG Chief Executive Giorgio Pradelli said.

item.title: Europe's Gas Prices Surge to Year-Highs Amid Supply Risks, Rising Demand
item.description: An intensification of the war between Russia and Ukraine is fueling concerns over potential curtailments in Europe’s gas market.

item.title: Nvidia nearly doubles revenue on strong AI demand
item.description: Nvidia reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

item.title: Intuit shares drop as quarterly forecast misses estimates due to delayed revenue
item.description: While Intuit reiterated its full-year view, the company said promotional changes in the current quarter will have implications for revenue timing.

item.title: Snowflake rockets 32%, its best day ever, after earnings beat
item.description: Snowflake reported better-than-expected results on the top and bottom lines.

item.title: Gap shares surge as it raises guidance, touts 'strong start' to holiday
item.description: Gap said Old Navy's sales fell after hurricanes led to store closures and warm weather deterred sales in its kids category.

item.title: Euro Risks Dropping to Parity Against Dollar as Economy Falters
item.description: The euro fell to a two-year low against the dollar and risks reaching parity, as concerns mount about the prospects for the eurozone economy.
